title: Living Local and Modern in Oakland
posting_body: ['The Broadway', '3093 Broadway, Oakland, CA, 94611', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 221', 'OR Text', '221', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'A NEW TAKE ON CITY LIVING - now offering 10 WEEKS + 1,000  FREE RENT!----advertised on a net effective lease term of 16 months', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 609 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Sophisticated apartment living is arriving at the intersection of Broadway and Piedmont.', 'Studio, one and two bedroom spaces feature unmatched amenities never before seen in Oakland.', 'With the genuine fixtures and modern finishes, you’ll love the stylish comfort of staying right at home.', '<URL>', 'Features', '- Central AC/Heating in all units', '- Walk-In Closets*', '- Stainless Steel Appliances (Gas Range)', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Carpet & Wood Style Floors', '- Equipped Kitchens', '- Double Pane Windows', '- Patio/Balcony*', '- Key-less front door entry', '- Brand New Apartments', '- USB outlets', '- High Speed Internet & Cable Ready', '- Sleek Finishes w/Quartz Counter-top', 'Community Amenities', '- Dog Run', '- Laundry Lockers', '- Brand New Building', '- Fitness Center', '- Maintenance Emergency 24/7', '- Yoga Studio', '- Luxury Living', '- Car Charging Station', '- Swimming Pool & Spa', '- Outdoor Fireplaces', '- Onsite Management 7 days', '- Door to Door Trash Pick-Up (Valet Living)', '- Package Lockers', '- Bike Storage', '- Rooftop Lounge', '- Pet Spa', '- Bocce Ball Court', '- Controlled Access Building', '- Courtesy Patrol', '- Resident Clubhouse', '- Hammock Park', '- Courtyard w/ BBQs', '- Onsite Storage', 'Driving Directions', 'We are conveniently located at 3093 Broadway Oakland, CA, 94611.', 'Our leasing office is located on G2 level.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Sunday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We are a pet friendly community.', 'However, we do have breed restrictions.', 'Please check with leasing team for further details.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Must earn (gross household income) 2.5 times amount of rent', '0nOEogEs']
